vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.tooltip: Granular controls for individual game animations. Each animation type can be toggled independently for maximum customization. Perfect for performance optimization or aesthetic preferences.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.allAnim: Global toggle that disables ALL animations when off, or allows individual animation settings when on. Use this as a quick performance boost by disabling all texture animations at once.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.water.t: Controls the animated water flow and wave effects in oceans, rivers, and waterfalls. Disabling removes the flowing animation but water physics remain intact.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.lava.to: Controls the bubbling and flowing animation of lava blocks and lava falls. Disabling creates static lava that still deals damage but lacks visual movement.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.fire.to: Controls the flickering flame effects on torches, campfires, furnaces, and fire blocks. Disabling creates static flames but fire spread mechanics remain unchanged.
Controls the swirling purple particle effects in Nether and End portals. Disabling removes the visual portal effects but portal travel still functions normally.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.sculk_s: Controls the pulsing redstone signal animation when Sculk Sensors detect vibrations. Disabling removes the visual feedback but sensor functionality remains intact.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.block_a: Controls animations for interactive blocks like chests opening, doors swinging, and note blocks playing. Disabling can improve performance but removes visual feedback for block interactions.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.water_s: Controls the subtle animation of water in lakes, ponds, and calm bodies of water. Disabling creates perfectly still water surfaces but maintains water physics and transparency.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.water_f: Controls the flowing animation of water in rivers, waterfalls, and when water spreads. Disabling creates static flowing water but maintains water movement mechanics.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.lava_st: Controls the bubbling animation of stationary lava blocks. Disabling creates static lava pools but maintains lava damage and light emission.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.lava_fl: Controls the flowing animation of moving lava streams and falls. Disabling creates static flowing lava but maintains lava spread mechanics and damage.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.fire0.t: Controls the primary flickering pattern of fire blocks. This frame provides the base fire animation and is essential for the dynamic flame appearance.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.fire1.t: Controls the secondary flickering pattern of fire blocks. This frame alternates with Frame 0 to create the realistic flame movement effect.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.soul_fi: Controls the blue-tinted flickering animation of soul fire blocks. Disabling creates static soul fire but maintains the blue color and light properties.
Controls the primary blue flickering pattern of soul fire. This frame provides the base animation for the ethereal soul fire appearance.
Controls the secondary blue flickering pattern of soul fire. This frame creates the mystical movement effect unique to soul fire.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.campfir: Controls the dancing flame animation above lit campfires. Disabling creates static campfire flames but maintains cooking functionality and light.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.soul_ca: Controls the blue dancing flame animation above lit soul campfires. Disabling creates static soul flames but maintains the blue glow and cooking.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.lantern: Controls the subtle swaying animation of lanterns hanging from blocks. Disabling creates static lanterns but maintains light emission and functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.soul_la: Controls the blue-tinted swaying animation of soul lanterns. Disabling creates static soul lanterns but maintains the blue light and functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.sea_lan: Controls the gentle pulsing animation of sea lanterns underwater. Disabling creates static sea lanterns but maintains the bright light emission.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.nether_: Controls the iconic purple swirling animation inside Nether portals. Disabling creates static portal interiors but maintains portal travel functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.end_por: Controls the starfield animation inside End portal frames. Disabling creates static End portals but maintains teleportation to the End dimension.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.end_gat: Controls the energy beam animation of End gateway portals. Disabling creates static gateways but maintains teleportation between End islands.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.magma.t: Controls the bubbling lava animation on magma block surfaces. Disabling creates static magma blocks but maintains damage and light properties.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.prismar: Controls the subtle color-shifting animation of prismarine blocks. Disabling creates static prismarine but maintains the underwater aesthetic.
Controls the color-shifting animation of prismarine brick blocks. Disabling creates static bricks but maintains the underwater building material appearance.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.dark_pr: Controls the deep color-shifting animation of dark prismarine blocks. Disabling creates static dark prismarine but maintains the ocean monument aesthetic.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.conduit: Controls the rotating eye animation of activated conduits. Disabling creates static conduits but maintains the conduit power effects and light.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.respawn: Controls the glowing charge animation of respawn anchors. Disabling creates static anchors but maintains respawn functionality and explosion properties.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.stonecu: Controls the spinning blade animation of stonecutter blocks. Disabling creates static stonecutters but maintains the block cutting functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.machine: Controls animations for functional blocks when they are active or processing items.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.blast_f: Controls the glowing front animation of blast furnaces when smelting. Disabling creates static furnaces but maintains smelting functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.smoker_: Controls the glowing front animation of smokers when cooking food. Disabling creates static smokers but maintains cooking functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.furnace: Controls the glowing front animation of furnaces when smelting. Disabling creates static furnaces but maintains smelting functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.plant_a: Controls swaying animations for underwater plants and vegetation.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.kelp.to: Controls the gentle swaying animation of kelp plants underwater. Disabling creates static kelp but maintains growth and harvesting mechanics.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.kelp_pl: Controls the swaying animation of kelp plant blocks underwater. Disabling creates static kelp plants but maintains the ocean ecosystem.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.seagras: Controls the subtle swaying animation of seagrass underwater. Disabling creates static seagrass but maintains the underwater biome appearance.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.tall_se: Controls the lower portion animation of tall seagrass underwater. Disabling creates static bottom sections but maintains the plant structure.
Controls the upper portion animation of tall seagrass underwater. Disabling creates static top sections but maintains the flowing appearance.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.stem_an: Controls texture animations for Nether fungus stems and related blocks.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.warped_: Controls the subtle texture animation of warped stem blocks. Disabling creates static stems but maintains the Nether aesthetic.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.crimson: Controls the texture animation of crimson stem blocks. Disabling creates static stems but maintains the crimson forest appearance.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.warped_: Controls the texture animation of warped hyphae blocks. Disabling creates static hyphae but maintains the warped forest aesthetic.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.crimson: Controls the texture animation of crimson hyphae blocks. Disabling creates static hyphae but maintains the crimson forest appearance.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.sculk_a: Controls animations for all Sculk family blocks and their sensory behaviors.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.sculk.t: Controls the subtle pulsing animation of sculk blocks. Disabling creates static sculk but maintains the Warden spawning mechanics.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.sculk_v: Controls the spreading animation of sculk veins on blocks. Disabling creates static veins but maintains the infection mechanics.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.sculk_s: Controls the side texture animation of sculk sensors when active. Disabling removes the visual feedback but maintains vibration detection.
Controls the top texture animation of sculk sensors when active. Disabling removes the visual feedback but maintains vibration detection.
Controls the activation animation of sculk shriekers. Disabling creates static shriekers but maintains the Warden summoning mechanics.
Controls the side texture animation of sculk shriekers when activated. Disabling removes visual feedback but maintains Warden summoning.
Controls the top texture animation of sculk shriekers when activated. Disabling removes visual feedback but maintains Warden summoning.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.calibra: Controls the animation of calibrated sculk sensors. Disabling removes visual feedback but maintains the adjustable vibration detection.
Controls the side texture animation of calibrated sculk sensors. Disabling removes visual feedback but maintains adjustable detection.
Controls the top texture animation of calibrated sculk sensors. Disabling removes visual feedback but maintains adjustable detection.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.command: Controls animations for command blocks and their variants when active.
Controls the front panel animation of command blocks. Disabling creates static command blocks but maintains command execution.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.chain_c: Controls the front panel animation of chain command blocks. Disabling creates static chains but maintains sequential command execution.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.repeati: Controls the front panel animation of repeating command blocks. Disabling creates static repeaters but maintains automatic command execution.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.additio: Controls animations for miscellaneous animated blocks and items.
Controls the rotating beam animation of active beacons. Disabling creates static beacon beams but maintains the status effect powers.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.dragon_: Controls the teleportation animation of dragon eggs when pushed. Disabling creates static eggs but maintains the teleportation mechanics.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.brewing: Controls the bubbling animation of brewing stand bases when brewing. Disabling creates static bases but maintains potion brewing functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.cauldro: Controls the water surface animation in cauldrons. Disabling creates static water surfaces but maintains cauldron functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.animation.enchant: Controls the page-turning animation of books above enchanting tables. Disabling creates static books but maintains enchanting functionality.
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.particle: Master toggle for all particle effects including explosions, water splashes, and environmental effects. Disabling significantly improves performance but removes most visual effects from gameplay.
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.allParti: Global toggle that disables ALL particles when off, or allows individual particle settings when on. Use this for major performance improvements by blocking all particle rendering at once.
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.flame.to: Controls flame particles from torches, furnaces, monster spawners, magma cubes, and blazes. Essential for identifying active spawners and magma cube behavior.
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.smoke.to: Controls smoke particles from torches, TNT explosions, droppers, dispensers, and End portals. Important for visual feedback on redstone contraptions and portal detection.
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.bubble.t: Controls bubble particles from entities swimming underwater, guardian laser beams, and fishing bobbers. Helps with underwater navigation and combat awareness.
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.splash.t: Entities in water, wolves shaking off after swimming
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.dripping: Dripping water through blocks, wet sponges, leaves when raining
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.explosio: Explosions, ghast fireballs, wither skulls, ender dragon death
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.crit.too: Critical hits, fully charged bow shots, crossbows, evoker fangs
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.happy_vi: Applying bone meal, trading with villagers, feeding baby animals
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.angry_vi: Attacking a villager, pandas getting hurt
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.ash.tool: Naturally generated in soul sand valley biome
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.campfire: Smoke produced by campfires and soul campfires
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.effect.t: Splash potions, lingering potions, bottles o' enchanting, evokers
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.dust.too: Redstone ore, powered redstone dust, redstone torches
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.poof.too: Explosions, death of mobs, monster spawner, silverfish
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.cloud.to: Clouds when entity completes death animation
Barrier block displays when holding Barrier item
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.block.to: Breaking blocks, sprinting, iron golems walking
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.bubble_c: Upward bubble columns made by soul sand under water
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.campfire: Smoke produced by campfires above hay bale
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.current_: Bubble column whirlpools made by magma blocks underwater
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.damage_i: From mobs and players when hurt by melee attack
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.dragon_b: Ender dragon's breath and dragon fireballs
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.dust_plu: Shown when adding items to decorated pots
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.electric: Appears when lightning bolt hits copper blocks
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.enchante: Attacking with enchanted sword or axe
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.entity_e: Status effects, lingering potions, tipped arrows, trading
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.falling_: Falling lava particles from pointed dripstone
Falling water particles from pointed dripstone
Floating sand, gravel, concrete powder, anvils
Dripping green particles from spore blossom
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.flash.to: Flash light when firework rocket explodes
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.gust.too: Created when wind charge hits a block
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.infested: Produced by entities with Infested effect
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.item.too: Eating, thrown eggs, splash potions, eyes of ender
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.item_cob: Produced by entities with weaving effect
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.item_sno: Thrown snowballs, creating withers, iron golems
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.landing_: Dripping crying obsidian landing on ground
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.large_sm: Fire, minecart with furnace, blazes, lava meeting water
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.light_bl: Light block displays when holding Light item
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.portal.t: Nether portals, enderman, endermites, ender pearls
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.scrape.t: Scraping oxidation off copper with axe
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.sculk_so: When mob dies near Sculk Catalyst
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.snowflak: Appears when sinking in powder snow
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.soul.too: Soul Speed enchantment on Soul Sand/Soul Soil
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.spit.too: Llamas spitting at player or mob
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.trail.to: Particle trail between Creaking mob and heart block
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.trial_sp: Produced when Trial Spawner is activated
Produced when Ominous Trial Spawner is activated
vulkanmod-extra.option.particle.vault_co: Produced when player is near vault
Removing wax from copper with axe
vulkanmod-extra.option.details.sky.toolt:
Controls sky rendering. Disabling removes the entire sky (including sun, moon, and stars).

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod-extra.option.details.sun.toolt: Controls sun rendering in the sky. Disabling removes the sun but doesn't affect daylight cycle or lighting - only the visual sun disk is hidden.
vulkanmod-extra.option.details.moon.tool: Controls moon rendering in the night sky. Disabling removes the moon but night time lighting and mob spawning remain unchanged.
vulkanmod-extra.option.details.stars.too: Controls starfield rendering in the night sky. Disabling removes stars but doesn't affect night vision potions or lighting calculations.
vulkanmod-extra.option.details.rain_snow:
Controls rain and snow rendering

§7Performance Impact: §6Medium
vulkanmod-extra.option.render.limit_beac:
Limits beacon beam height for performance

§7Performance Impact: §aLow (Positive)
vulkanmod-extra.option.render.item_frame: Controls item frame name tag rendering
vulkanmod-extra.option.render.global_fog:
Controls atmospheric fog effects that reduce visibility at distance. Disabling creates clear air but may impact depth perception in large open areas.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod-extra.option.render.multi_dime:
Use per-dimension fog settings instead of single fog for all dimensions

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod-extra.option.render.prevent_sh:
Prevents shader loading for better performance

§7Performance Impact: §aHigh (Positive)
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.show_fps.to:
Displays real-time frames per second (FPS) counter overlay on screen. Useful for monitoring performance and troubleshooting lag issues.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.fps_display:
Simple: just FPS
 Full: adds min/max/average FPS + GPU VRAM usage
 Detailed: adds FPS 1% and 0.1% low and more GPU memory statistics.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.overlay_cor: Chooses which corner of the screen to display overlay information like FPS and coordinates. Useful for avoiding conflicts with other mods or preferred viewing positions.
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.text_contra: Controls the text rendering style for overlay information.
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.show_coords: Displays current player coordinates (X, Y, Z) overlay on screen. Essential for building projects, sharing locations, and navigation in large worlds.
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.toasts.tool: Controls popup achievement and advancement notifications in the top-right corner. Disabling removes visual notifications but achievements are still unlocked.
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.advancement: Controls the popup notifications that appear when earning advancements and achievements. Disabling removes visual celebration but progress is still saved.
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.recipe_toas: Controls the popup notifications when unlocking new crafting recipes. Disabling removes the visual hint but recipes remain unlocked in your recipe book.
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.system_toas: Controls important system notifications like connection status, world saves, and critical game events. Recommended to keep enabled for important information.
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.tutorial_to: Controls the tutorial hints and tips that appear when learning game mechanics. Disabling removes guidance but doesn't prevent learning through gameplay.
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.instant_sne:
Removes the smooth transition animation when entering/exiting sneak mode, making the change instant. Useful for precise movement in technical gameplay but may feel less natural to some players.

§7Performance Impact: §aLow (Positive)
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.use_adaptiv:
Synchronizes the game's frame rate with your monitor's refresh rate to reduce screen tearing and input lag. Requires a compatible graphics card and monitor. May slightly increase CPU usage but provides smoother visuals.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.steady_debu:
Updates the debug screen (F3) information at consistent intervals instead of every frame.

§7Performance Impact: §aLow (Positive)
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.reduce_reso:
Reduces resolution for better performance on Mac.

§7Performance Impact: §aHigh (Positive)
vulkanmod-extra.option.extra.advanced_it: Show detailed item tooltips with identifiers and durability
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog.tooltip: Adjusts the fog effect distance per dimension. 0 = vanilla fog, 1-32 = chunks, 33 = max distance
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog_start.tooltip: Adjusts when terrain fog begins to render
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog_type.atmosphe: Controls fog from atmosphere and weather
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog_type.dimensio: Controls fog from dimension effects or boss areas
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog_type.environm: Controls environment fog end distance multiplier
Controls environment fog start distance multiplier
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog_type.lava.too: Controls fog effect when submerged in lava
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog_type.powder_s: Controls fog effect when inside powder snow
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog_type.render_d: Controls render fog end distance multiplier
Controls render fog start distance multiplier
vulkanmod-extra.option.fog_type.cloud_en: Controls cloud fog end multiplier for %s
vulkanmod.options.video.monitor_selectio: Select which monitor to use for fullscreen mode. Changes will take effect when entering fullscreen.
vulkanmod.options.video.resolution.toolt: Sets the fullscreen resolution. Changes take effect when toggling fullscreen mode.
vulkanmod.options.video.refreshRate.tool: Controls the display refresh rate in fullscreen mode. Higher values provide smoother motion.
vulkanmod.options.video.fullscreen.toolt: Toggle between fullscreen and windowed mode. Use F11 to toggle quickly.
vulkanmod.options.video.windowedFullscre: Borderless windowed mode. Faster alt-tab but may have slightly higher input lag than exclusive fullscreen.
vulkanmod.options.video.framerateLimit.t: Limits maximum FPS. Lower values reduce power consumption and heat generation.
vulkanmod.options.video.vsync.tooltip:
Synchronizes frame rendering with display refresh rate. Eliminates screen tearing but may increase input lag.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod.options.video.guiScale.tooltip: Controls the size of GUI elements. Auto adjusts based on resolution. Higher values make interface larger.
vulkanmod.options.video.gamma.tooltip: Adjusts screen brightness. Higher values make dark areas more visible but may reduce contrast.
vulkanmod.options.video.viewBobbing.tool: Screen sways when walking. Disable if it causes motion sickness or interferes with gameplay.
Shows crosshair attack indicator. Controls when the attack cooldown indicator appears.
vulkanmod.options.video.autosaveIndicato: Shows a spinning icon when the world is being automatically saved.
vulkanmod.options.graphics.renderDistanc:
Maximum distance for rendering chunks. Higher values allow you to see further but reduce performance.

§7Performance Impact: §cHigh
vulkanmod.options.graphics.simulationDis:
Distance at which game mechanics (mob spawning, redstone, etc.) are simulated. Lower values improve performance.

§7Performance Impact: §6Medium
vulkanmod.options.graphics.prioritizeChu:
Controls how chunk updates are prioritized. 'Nearby' focuses on chunks around the player first.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod.options.graphics.graphics.tool:
Overall graphics quality. Fancy enables additional visual effects like better grass and leaves.

§7Performance Impact: §6Medium
vulkanmod.options.graphics.particles.too:
Controls particle density. Lower settings improve performance by reducing particle effects.

§7Performance Impact: §6Medium
Controls cloud rendering. Off disables clouds entirely, Fast renders simple clouds, Fancy renders detailed clouds.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod.options.graphics.biomeBlendRad:
Controls how smoothly biome colors blend at borders. Higher values create smoother transitions but reduce performance.

§7Performance Impact: §cHigh
vulkanmod.options.graphics.entityShadows:
Enables shadows under entities (players, mobs, items). Disable to improve performance.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod.options.graphics.entityDistanc:
Controls how far away entities are rendered. Lower values improve performance by culling distant entities.

§7Performance Impact: §6Medium
Controls texture detail at distance. Higher levels reduce texture flickering but use more GPU memory.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod.options.other.frameQueue.toolt:
Higher values might help stabilize frametime but will increase input lag.

§7Performance Impact: §eLow
vulkanmod.options.other.chunkBuilderThre:
Number of threads used for chunk building. More threads improve chunk loading speed on multi-core CPUs.

§7Performance Impact: §6Medium
